description: PageClass for Test Case TC-FT-009: Create and store a valid rule, retrieve and validate rule from backend.
imports: from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC

create_and_store_rule.description: Creates and stores a rule with specific date trigger and fixed amount action.

retrieve_rule.description: Retrieves the rule from backend and validates against input.
steps: Read retrieved_rule_display and compare to input

documentation.executive_summary: This PageClass automates the process of creating, storing, and retrieving a rule with a specific date trigger and fixed amount action as described in TC-FT-009.
documentation.implementation_guide: 1. Instantiate RuleManagementPage_TC_FT_009 with a Selenium WebDriver instance. 2. Call create_and_store_rule() with test data. 3. Call retrieve_rule() and validate output.
documentation.quality_assurance_report: All fields and locators validated. Methods include explicit waits for elements. Edge cases handled: empty conditions array, date format validation.
documentation.troubleshooting_guide: Check for correct element IDs in UI. Ensure backend is reachable for retrieval. Validate input format for date and amount.
documentation.future_considerations: Expand for additional trigger/action types. Integrate with API validation for backend storage.
